name: Ducktective (Kosmopol, Revelion-santi, Clara (Gato Cato), Cute Games, Clement O, SORENU, Brat Rat, Guillaume David)
name_original: Ducktective (Kosmopol, Revelion-santi, Clara (Gato Cato), Cute Games, Clement O, SORENU, Brat Rat, Guillaume David)
description: Ducktective is an amazing game in which you play as 3 ducks under a trench coat. For the first time in history, a bird killed an human. The bird's world is in struggle because this situation threatens the Secret : humans must not know that birds can talk. Solve the investigation, find the culprit and quack the case !
